# uofg-card

This component adds a card, which are surfaces that display content and actions on a single topic.

## Usage

```html
<uofg-card>
  <img slot="img" />
  <span slot="title">YOUR TITLE HERE</span>
  <span slot="subtitle">YOUR SUBTITLE HERE</span>
  <span slot="body">YOUR CONTENT</span>
  <span slot="footer">YOUR FOOTER CONTENT HERE</span>
</uofg-card>
```

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                                                 | Type     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `href`   | `href`    | The URL the card should link to. If this property is set, the card will be rendered as an anchor ("a" tag). | `string` | `undefined` |
